tunnel_id.description: Tunnel ID for the tunnel to be modified
tunnel_id.usage: Tunnel with this id will be modified

setup_priority.usage: Setup priority of tunnel will be modified to the value specified

hold_priority.usage: Hold priority of tunnel will be modified to the value specified

fast_reroute.usage: FRR of tunnel will be set (true) or unset (false)

bandwidth.description: Bandwidth to be set in kbps
bandwidth.usage: Bandwidth of the tunnel will be set to the value specified

provider.description: Provider to be used to connect to the router

mop_timeout.description: Timeout duration for MoP i.e. maximum time spent in Running/Paused states. e.g. 900s, 10m, 1.5h, etc. Valid time units are 'ns', 'us' (or 'Âµs'), 'ms', 's', 'm', 'h'.
